document_data.name: The Sword Dancers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sword Dancers''' were a faction within the [[Everlasting]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Holy Slayer Sourcebook|20}}
document_data.Base of Operations: The Sword Dancers were based in the fortress of [[Sarahin]] located deep within the [[Haunted Lands]].
document_data.Activities:
This young faction held beliefs that often clashed with the views of other [[holy slayer]] groups.

They used fiery cleansing rituals, fasting, and ecstatic ritual dancing to strengthen their powers.
document_data.History:
The [[Court of Rhythm]] served as the origin of the Sword Dancers.

The [[Unclean (Zakhara)|Unclean]] viewed the Sword Dancers as allies and the perfect complement to their sorcerous might.
document_data.Members: The Sword Dancers were led by an [[efreeti]] named [[Farouk Abd al-Bazan]]. There were 43 members as of 1367 DR.
